heading: Frequently Asked Questions
body:
## General Questions

### What is Imajin?

Imajin designs and manufactures modular LED fixture systems. Our products combine innovative design with practical functionality, allowing you to create custom lighting installations for any space.

### Where are your products made?

Our products are designed and manufactured in Canada.

## Ordering & Shipping

### What is the Founder Edition?

The Founder Edition is a limited run of 1,000 units (500 BLACK, 300 WHITE, 200 RED) that includes:
- 10-year warranty
- Solana NFT token (RWA)
- Premium packaging
- Expanded controller (Control-8-24v with 2 of 8 outputs used)

### How long does shipping take?

Shipping times vary by location:
- **Canada:** 3-7 business days
- **United States:** 5-10 business days
- **International:** 10-21 business days

### Do you ship internationally?

Yes! We ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination.

### What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards via Stripe. Solana Pay integration coming soon for MJN token payments.

## Products & Technical

### Can I expand my system later?

Absolutely! Our modular system is designed for expansion. The Founder Edition includes a Control-8-24v controller with room to add up to 6 more panel outputs.

### What's the difference between 5v and 24v systems?

- **5v System:** Suitable for smaller installations (8-10 panels max). Uses Control-2-5v controller.
- **24v System:** Scalable for large installations (64-80 panels). Uses Control-8-24v or Control-16-24v.

**Important:** You cannot mix 5v and 24v components in the same fixture.

### What's included with the DIY kit?

The DIY Kit includes:
- Material-8x8-V panels (quantity varies by kit)
- Spine connectors
- Round diffusion caps
- Installation hardware
- Assembly instructions

Controller and power supply sold separately.

## Warranty & Returns

### What is your warranty policy?

- **Founder Edition:** 10-year warranty
- **Standard Products:** 2-year warranty

Warranty covers manufacturing defects and component failures under normal use.

### What is your return policy?

We offer a 30-day return policy on most products. See our [Returns Policy](/returns) for full details.

### How do I get support?

Contact us at [info@imajin.ca](mailto:info@imajin.ca) or visit our [Contact Page](/contact).

## Pre-Orders

### When will pre-order items ship?

Pre-order shipping dates are displayed on product pages. You'll receive an email notification when your order ships.

### Can I cancel a pre-order?

Yes, pre-orders can be cancelled at any time before shipping. Contact us at info@imajin.ca.

---

**Still have questions?** [Contact our team](/contact) - we're happy to help!
